titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Whaddon in Buckinghamshyre the 22. of Nouember 1593. at the buriall of the Right Honorable, Arthur Lorde Grey of Wilton, Knight of the most Honorable order of the Garter, by Thomas Sparke pastor of Blechley
titleStmt.author: Sparke, Thomas, 1548-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
